author: Special Correspondent
text:
: The Mahila Court on Tuesday sentenced a labourer in Gobichettipalayam limits to life imprisonment for raping a 15-year-old girl last year.

Thanaseer (30) had also threatened the girl with murder if she revealed the rape. The Gobi All Women Police registered a case in July last year, and also included the name of Thanaseer's wife Rasitha Banu as an accused for issuing threats to the girl.

Mahila Court Judge Thirunavakarasu sentenced Thanaseer to life imprisonment under POCSO (Protection of Children against Sexual Offences) Act, and imposed fine of Rs. 5,000.

Another seven-year sentence was pronounced for threatening the girl.

Both terms will run concurrently, as per the judgement. Rasitha Banu was let off.
title: Labourer gets life term for raping minor
